languages.text: Этот почтенный "Леман Расс" известен как Скипийский каратель, служивший династии фон Валанциус два столетия. В бою с населявшими Скипию II ксеносами он был подбит, но героически уничтожил шестьдесят три единицы техники врага и принес победу соратникам, обеспечив себе статус благословленной Императором реликвии.

traits.locale_text: Этот почтенный "Леман Расс" известен как Скипийский каратель. В бою с населявшими Скипию II ксеносами он был подбит, но героически уничтожил шестьдесят три единицы техники врага и принес победу соратникам, обеспечив себе статус благословленной Императором реликвии.

languages.text: This venerable Leman Russ is known as the Skipian Punisher and it has served the von Valancius dynasty for two centuries. It was hit in the battle with the xenos that inhabited Skipia II, but it heroically destroyed sixty-three enemy vehicles and brought victory to its comrades, securing its status as a relic blessed by the Emperor.
languages.original_text: Этот почтенный "Леман Расс" известен как Скипийский каратель, служивший династии фон Валанциус два столетия. В бою с населявшими Скипию II ксеносами он был подбит, но героически уничтожил шестьдесят три единицы техники врага и принес победу соратникам, обеспечив себе статус благословленной Императором реликвии.

This venerable Leman Russ is known as the Skipian Punisher and it has served the von Valancius dynasty for two centuries. It was hit in the battle with the xenos that inhabited Skipia II, but it heroically destroyed sixty-three enemy vehicles and brought victory to its comrades, securing its status as a relic blessed by the Emperor.

languages.text: この尊きレマン・ラスはスキピアのパニッシャーとして知られており、2世紀にわたってフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えてきた。スキピアⅡに住んでいた異種族との戦いで損傷したが、63台の車両を雄々しく破壊し、同志に勝利をもたらした。皇帝の祝福を受けた聖遺物として、その地位は揺るぎないものとなっている。
languages.original_text: This venerable Leman Russ is known as the Skipian Punisher and it has served the von Valancius dynasty for two centuries. It was hit in the battle with the xenos that inhabited Skipia II, but it heroically destroyed sixty-three enemy vehicles and brought victory to its comrades, securing its status as a relic blessed by the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: この尊きレマン・ラスはスキピアのパニッシャーとして知られており、2世紀にわたってフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝に仕えてきた。スキピアⅡに住んでいた異種族との戦いで損傷したが、63台の車両を雄々しく破壊し、同志に勝利をもたらした。皇帝の祝福を受けた聖遺物として、その地位は揺るぎないものとなっている。

languages.text: 这辆古老的黎曼·鲁斯坦克被称为“斯基皮亚惩罚者”，已经为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服役了两个世纪。在斯基皮亚二号星的那场对抗异形的战斗中，这辆坦克在被损毁之前，英勇地摧毁了六十三辆敌方战车，为人类带来了胜利。这样的英雄功绩，让它被尊为帝皇所庇佑的遗物。
languages.original_text: This venerable Leman Russ is known as the Skipian Punisher and it has served the von Valancius dynasty for two centuries. It was hit in the battle with the xenos that inhabited Skipia II, but it heroically destroyed sixty-three enemy vehicles and brought victory to its comrades, securing its status as a relic blessed by the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: 这辆古老的黎曼·鲁斯坦克被称为“斯基皮亚惩罚者”，已经为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝服役了两个世纪。在斯基皮亚二号星的那场对抗异形的战斗中，这辆坦克在被损毁之前，英勇地摧毁了六十三辆敌方战车，为人类带来了胜利。这样的英雄功绩，让它被尊为帝皇所庇佑的遗物。

languages.text: Este venerable Leman Russ es el Castigador de Skipia y ha servido a la dinastía von Valancius desde hace dos siglos. Fue alcanzado en la batalla contra los xenos que habitaban en Skipia II, pero destruyó heroicamente sesenta y tres vehículos enemigos y obtuvo la victoria para sus camaradas, confirmando su estatus de reliquia bendita por el Emperador.
languages.original_text: This venerable Leman Russ is known as the Skipian Punisher and it has served the von Valancius dynasty for two centuries. It was hit in the battle with the xenos that inhabited Skipia II, but it heroically destroyed sixty-three enemy vehicles and brought victory to its comrades, securing its status as a relic blessed by the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Este venerable Leman Russ es el Castigador de Skipia y ha servido a la dinastía von Valancius desde hace dos siglos. Fue alcanzado en la batalla contra los xenos que habitaban en Skipia II, pero destruyó heroicamente sesenta y tres vehículos enemigos y obtuvo la victoria para sus camaradas, confirmando su estatus de reliquia bendita por el Emperador.

languages.text: Ce vénérable Leman Russ, appelé Tortionnaire des skipiens, a servi la dynastie von Valancius pendant deux siècles. Gravement endommagé au cours de la bataille de Skipia-II, habitée par des xénos, il parvint néanmoins à abattre pas moins de soixante-trois véhicules ennemis, permettant ainsi à ses camarades de remporter la victoire, et devenant par là même une relique bénie par l'Empereur.
languages.original_text: This venerable Leman Russ is known as the Skipian Punisher and it has served the von Valancius dynasty for two centuries. It was hit in the battle with the xenos that inhabited Skipia II, but it heroically destroyed sixty-three enemy vehicles and brought victory to its comrades, securing its status as a relic blessed by the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Ce vénérable Leman Russ, appelé Tortionnaire des skipiens, a servi la dynastie von Valancius pendant deux siècles. Gravement endommagé au cours de la bataille de Skipia-II, habitée par des xénos, il parvint néanmoins à abattre pas moins de soixante-trois véhicules ennemis, permettant ainsi à ses camarades de remporter la victoire, et devenant par là même une relique bénie par l'Empereur.

languages.text: Dieser ehrwürdige Leman Russ ist bekannt als Skipia-Punisher und hat der Dynastie von Valancius zwei Jahrhunderte lang gedient. Er wurde in der Schlacht gegen die Xenos getroffen, die Skipia II besetzt hatten, konnte aber heldenhaft 36 feindliche Fahrzeuge zerstören und brachte seinen Kameraden den Sieg, was seinen Status als vom Imperator gesegnetes Relikt begründete.
languages.original_text: This venerable Leman Russ is known as the Skipian Punisher and it has served the von Valancius dynasty for two centuries. It was hit in the battle with the xenos that inhabited Skipia II, but it heroically destroyed sixty-three enemy vehicles and brought victory to its comrades, securing its status as a relic blessed by the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Dieser ehrwürdige Leman Russ ist bekannt als Skipia-Punisher und hat der Dynastie von Valancius zwei Jahrhunderte lang gedient. Er wurde in der Schlacht gegen die Xenos getroffen, die Skipia II besetzt hatten, konnte aber heldenhaft 36 feindliche Fahrzeuge zerstören und brachte seinen Kameraden den Sieg, was seinen Status als vom Imperator gesegnetes Relikt begründete.

languages.text: Bu ulu Leman Russ, Skipialı Cezalandırıcı adıyla bilinir. İki yüz yıldır von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet etmektedir. Skipia II'ye çöken zenolarla savaşırken hasar almış ama yiğitçe altmış üç düşman aracını yok edip yoldaşlarına zafer kazandırmış. Böylelikle de İmparator'un kutsadığı bir yadigâra dönüşmüş.
languages.original_text: This venerable Leman Russ is known as the Skipian Punisher and it has served the von Valancius dynasty for two centuries. It was hit in the battle with the xenos that inhabited Skipia II, but it heroically destroyed sixty-three enemy vehicles and brought victory to its comrades, securing its status as a relic blessed by the Emperor.

traits.locale_text: Bu ulu Leman Russ, Skipialı Cezalandırıcı adıyla bilinir. İki yüz yıldır von Valancius hanedanlığına hizmet etmektedir. Skipia II'ye çöken zenolarla savaşırken hasar almış ama yiğitçe altmış üç düşman aracını yok etmiş ve yoldaşlarına zafer kazandırmış. Böylelikle de İmparator'un kutsadığı bir yadigâr olarak bir yer edinmiş.
